headline: Adobe And Cognizant AI Push Tests Content Growth And Valuation Gap
summary: Adobe and Cognizant have expanded their partnership to bring generative AI into large-scale enterprise content creation and governance. The collaboration focuses on using Adobe's AI platforms to help organizations manage content supply chains, improve efficiency, and tighten controls. The move comes as enterprises face rising demand for personalized content and stricter requirements around compliance and brand consistency. Adobe, listed as NasdaqGS:ADBE, is working on this AI push while its...

headline: Why is Travel + Leisure Co. (TNL) One of the Most Undervalued Travel Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: Travel + Leisure Co. (NYSE:TNL) is one of the most undervalued travel stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On January 28, Cognizant announced the renewal of a multi-million-dollar strategic collaboration with Travel + Leisure Co. headline: Palantir And Cognizant Partnership Deepens AI Role In Regulated Industries
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) announced a partnership with Cognizant to expand AI driven modernization across healthcare and enterprise operations. The collaboration is focused on deploying Palantir's AI platform into complex, highly regulated sectors using Cognizant's global IT services reach. The agreement is positioned to support digital transformation projects at scale in healthcare and other data intensive industries. For you as an investor, this move highlights how Palantir is...
